amendment.description: To amend the International Financial Institutions Act to provide for modification of the Enhanced Heavily Indebted Poor Countries (HIPC) Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 686 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 686 proposed by Senator Biden. (consideration: CR 5/15/2003 S6485-6488; text: CR 5/15/2003 S6486) To amend the International Financial Institutions Act to provide for modification of the Enhanced Heavily Indebted Poor Countries (HIPC) Initiative.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 686 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 686 proposed by Senator Biden.
